summary: A simple mod to increase level cap of NPCs affected by the power
descriptionHtml:
I started working on this mod because \"Vampire\'s Seduction\" power should have been meant to virtually affect all NPCs, so I tried to create a mod to increase the level cap limit. Now all NPCs fall under the effect of the Vampire\'s Seduction Power.
Although I did come across some mods on nexus where the vampire\'s seduction were modified as well, however i only had the max level cap up to level 54, and the power was not strong enough for higher level enemies. So I decided to personally create my own mod, I tested it, and now I thought I would share it.

The mod was a work in progress. However i stopped after i modified the following:
- Vampire\'s Seduction ( up to level 1000 )
- Vampire\'s Servant ( up to approx. level 999 )
- Nightingale Strife ( absorbs 200 points of health )

-----------------------------------
DAWNGUARD is required
-----------------------------------

I hope that many will ENJOY this simple mod !!  :-)
author: MonkeyD2013
